Nguyễn Cư Trinh is a ward () of District 1 in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
Geography location
Nguyễn Cư Trinh ward lies on the southwest of District 1, borders with:
*Wards of Cô Giang and Phạm Ngũ Lão to the east by Trần Hưng Đạo Boulevard and Nguyễn Cư Trinh Street (stretch from Trần Hưng Đạo to Cống Quỳnh Street)
*Ward 2 and Ward 4, District 5 to the west by Nguyễn Văn Cừ Boulevard
*Cầu Kho Ward to the south by Trần Hưng Đạo Boulevard (stretch from Hồ Hảo Hớn to Nguyễn Văn Cừ Boulevard)
*Ward 2 and Ward 5, District 3 and Phạm Ngũ Lão ward to the west by streets of Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai and Cống Quỳnh.
The ward has an area of 0,77 km², with population in 2021 is 20.878 người, population density is 27.114 people/km².
History
Beforr 1975, Nguyễn Cư Trinh là một was a ward of the 2nd District (District 2), City of Saigon.
In 1976, District 2 was merged into District 1, Nguyễn Cư Trinh ward dissolved and separated into two numeric wards are 14 and 15 of District 1.
On December 28, 1988, The Council of Ministers issued Decision No. 184-HĐBT. From that, ward 14 and 15 merged together to re-establish Nguyễn Cư Trinh Ward of District 1, Ho Chi Minh City.
Gallery and notable landmarks
File:Nga sau Cong hoa, nguyen cu trinh, q 1 hcmvn - panoramio.jpg|Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai Street (left) and Phạm Viết Chánh Street (right) with Phong Châu Park in the middle, looked from Cộng Hòa roundabout
File:NGa Sau Cong Hoa,tp Hồ Chí Minh, Hồ Chí Minh 70000, Việt Nam - panoramio.jpg|Royal Centre Tower and Hotel Nikko Saigon on Nguyễn Văn Cừ Street, looked from Cộng Hòa roundabout
File:Duong Cong Quynh, quan 1, Nguyen cu trinh,hcmvn - panoramio.jpg|Từ Dũ Maternity Hospital, M Area
File:Sieu thi Co opmart, Cong Quynh, Pham ngu lao, hcmvn - panoramio.jpg|Co.opmart Cống Quỳnh, the first supermarket of Saigon Co.op to be opened
File:Goc nga tu Tran Dinh Xu Va Tran hung Dao, phuong Nguyễn Cư Trinh, Quận 1, TPHCM, Việt Nam - panoramio.jpg|Vinafood II Tower on corner streets of Trần Đình Xu - Trần Hưng Đạo
File:Goc tran Hung Dao va Nguyễn Cư Trinh, Quận 1, TPHCM, Việt Nam - panoramio.jpg|Pullman Saigon Centre Hotel
